calendar_events.title: Dr. Smith - Cardiology
calendar_events.description: Annual heart checkup. {driver_name} will drive. She arrives at {pickup_time}. Leave house at {leave_time}. Bring insurance card and medication list.

calendar_events.title: Grocery shopping with Tom
calendar_events.description: {driver_name} will pick you up at {pickup_time}. Shopping list ready. Bring reusable bags.

calendar_events.title: Exercise class
calendar_events.description: Gentle Yoga. Drive yourself. Leave at {leave_time} (fifteen minute drive). Bring water bottle and yoga mat.

calendar_events.title: Book Club
calendar_events.description: Discussing 'The Great Gatsby'. {driver_name} will drive. Pickup at {pickup_time}. Bring the book.

calendar_events.title: Pick up prescription
calendar_events.description: Drive yourself to pharmacy. Leave at {leave_time}. Bring ID and insurance card.

calendar_events.title: Dr. Johnson - Dentist
calendar_events.description: Regular cleaning. {driver_name} will drive. He arrives at {pickup_time}. Leave house at 10:45 AM. Bring insurance card.

calendar_events.title: Pay monthly bills with John
calendar_events.description: Bryce (grandson, 19) is coming to help you pay bills using online banking. He will bring a computer to help you setup accounts.

calendar_events.title: Family dinner at Sarah's
calendar_events.description: Sunday dinner. {driver_name} will pick you up at {pickup_time}. Bring the apple pie you baked.
